result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A. Junion was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: with all other sentences.

superMiscConds.notes: Counseling and Evaluation deemed appropriate by agent.
Amount to be determined within 60 days.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: with all other sentences.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael A. Junion in court with attorney Jessica Schuster & Gavin Grubofski.  Defendant Michael A. Junion in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court calls  @ 1:49 pm.  Waiver of P.H. & Plea advisement filed. Joint stipulation Plea to charge,  5 yrs prison, 2 yrs initial confinement & 3 yrs extended supervision, concurrent with all other sentence, counseling & joint & several restitution to be determined within 60 days, 22 days credit, costs, Parties agree to plea agreement.   Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing.  Court accepts waiver and finds probable cause. Information Filed. 
Atty Schuster has copy of information & waives reading. Ct 1 Burglary, Guilty. Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. rights. Court directs clerk to enter plea. Atty Grubofski is satisfied & factual basis.  Factual basis from Complaint.  Court finds factual basis & accepts Guilty plea & enter JOC on ct 1 Burglary.  Victim rights complied.  Def. has nothing to say.  State heard on restitution.  
Court accepts joint recommendation & orders, 5 years prison, 2 yrs initial confinement 3 yrs extended supervision,  Def. is eligible for Challenge Camp & Substance Abuse. Counseling & evaluation deemed appropriate by agent, Restitution joint & several, determined within 60 days, costs, State must provide amount to counsel, Def. advised of firearm & voting rights. DNA surcharge,  22 days credit. Sentence is concurrent with all other sentences.  Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence completed. Def. advised of postconviction rights.

Defendant Michael A. Junion in court via video with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Michael A. Junion in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint  received, reviewed.  Time limits for preliminary waived and right to preliminary waived.  Court reviews right to preliminary hearing.    Def waives right to preliminary.  Court will accept waiver.  Court finds probable cause.  Information to be filed.  Bond will continue  Arraignment scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael A. Junion
Current: E3335 County Rd K, Casco, WI   (Effective: 04-30-2015)
Prior: 421 Fourth Street Apt B, Algoma, WI 54201

Defendant Michael A. Junion in court via video, in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called 3:29 p.m. Def has copy of complaint. Def does not need read. Understands charge and possible penalties. Def wishes to get atty. State gives bond recommendation.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm. (Verified with Judge, warrant canceled)
